column4: okay so, linus dislikes Gnome. But does that also mean he descourages the use of GTK, because we simply cannot survive without it.....just woundering...
ah yea better read up on it..
linus like the options in KDE.. he says a power user should be able to fiddle till his hearts  content in the preferences, not have them hidden away for babies
i do not know that he doesn't like gtk
